title: All Ball - Liberty HC Ritchie McKay on Coaching Highs/Lows, Tony Bennett Influence, OK St. Tourney Matchup
itunes:title: All Ball - Liberty HC Ritchie McKay on Coaching Highs/Lows, Tony Bennett Influence, OK St. Tourney Matchup
description:
In this episode, Doug talks with Liberty Head Coach Ritchie McKay about his path into coaching, the importance of his faith, the time "Midnight" Lute Olsen stole Jason Terry after Terry committed to Washington, his up and down tenure at New Mexico, what he learned under Tony Bennett, and his mindset heading into the tournament and his team's first round matchup with Oklahoma State and potential #1 NBA pick Cade Cunningham. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
